H0.text: In Norse mythology, what group of female figures decides who lives and dies during battle, and then transports half of the dead to Valhalla. Valkyries

H1.text: In Norse mythology, what group of female figures decides who lives and dies during battle, and then transports half of the dead to Valhalla. Norns

H2.text: In Norse mythology, what group of female figures decides who lives and dies during battle, and then transports half of the dead to Valhalla. Disir

H3.text: In Norse mythology, what group of female figures decides who lives and dies during battle, and then transports half of the dead to Valhalla. GÃ¶l

A4.text: High says 'these women are called valkyries, and they are sent by Odin to every battle, where they choose which men are to die and they determine who has victory'

A5.text: In Norse mythology, a valkyrie ( VAL-kirr-ee or  val-KEER-ee; from Old Norse: valkyrja, lit. 'chooser of the slain') is one of a host of female figures who guide souls of the dead to the god Odin's hall Valhalla.
